name: Streadata.io API Gallery - System Award Management
description: This is a repository of system award management APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: System Award Management
apis.description: The SAM API is a RESTful method of retrieving public information about the businesses or individuals (referred to as “entities”) within the SAM data set. The entities publicly available data set can currently be retrieved on an entity-by-entity basis.
